A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a really bad movie. The only reason I am giving it 2 stars and not 1 is because I am a huge Star Wars fan. I hope they can turn this around in the next movie. The Kylo Ren scene with Snoke and fighting the Imperial Guards was not even well choreographed. I would rate this ahead of episode 1 but not any of the other prequels and the prequels were not as good as the original trilogy. Also what was with the force connection thing?  That just did not work.
